original_title: Music, Money, Madness… Jimi Hendrix Live In Maui
overview: Jimi Hendrix Experience s storied visit to Maui, their performance on the dormant lower crater of Haleakala volcano on the island and how the band became ensnared with the ill-fated Rainbow Bridge movie produced by their controversial manager Michael Jeffery.
tagline: Music, Money, Madness . . . Jimi Hendrix Live In Maui
title: Music, Money, Madness… Jimi Hendrix Live In Maui
